text: Xinshimen a! Nimen buyao yin zebei [shou shi ren ruhe shiyong nimen de shishe wu] he shanghai [tamen] er shi nimen de shishe wu tulao, haobi wei le xiang renmen xuanyao [zhu][gumingdiaoyu] er shishe ziji de caiwu zhe, qishi, ta bing bu xinyang an la he mori. Ta de qingkuang youru yikuai guanghua de shitou, shitou shangmian you chentu, dayu luo zai shangmian, you ba ta chongxi cheng guanghua de shitou.[Ruguo shishe ren zebei de zhuiwen shou shi ren ruhe shiyong shishe wu huo shanghai tamen, name,] tamen jiang buneng huode tamen suo shishe de renhe huibao. An la jue bu yindao bu xinyang de minzhong.
